entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who has found a map. He is hesitant to hand it in to Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is trying to convince Harry to hand the map in to Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts who is surprised by Hermione's suggestion that Harry should hand the map in.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned as someone to whom Harry might hand the map.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a staff member at Hogwarts who is mentioned as someone who would know if Fred and George had nicked something.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are students at Hogwarts who have nicked something that Harry has found.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is a person mentioned as someone who might be using the map to get into the castle.

relationships.description: Hermione suggests that Harry should hand the map in to Professor McGonagall.
Harry is worried that if he hands the map in, Filch will know that Fred and George nicked it.
Hermione is concerned that Sirius Black might be using the map to get into the castle.
